# tg_cluster (Resource)

Manage a TG node cluster

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "tg_cluster" "mycluster" {
  name = "mycluster"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Cluster Name

### Read-Only

- `fqdn` (String) Cluster FQDN
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
